alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 15 at 1:28PM MST until January 16 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills from -10F to -20F. * WHERE...Cache Valley/Utah Portion. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Clearing skies, light winds, and snow cover will lead to a cold night. Low temperatures Tuesday morning will range from 0F to -10F. Despite light winds, wind chill values will drop to as low as -20F.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
